newsitem.title: USA: XOX completes IPO, raises about $5 mln.
newsitem.headline: XOX completes IPO, raises about $5 mln.

text.p: XOX Corp said Monday it completed its initial public offering of 870,000 units and raised net proceeds of about $5 million.
It said the offering consisted of 870,000 units including 20,000 additional units purchased and sold by the underwriter for an over-allotment option.
Each unit was priced at $7 and consisted of one share of common stock and one warrant to buy a share of common at $8 per share.

The company develops specialized geometry software and licenses it to applications software developers in the geoscience, CAD/CAM, scientific visualization and medical imaging industries. Equity Securities Trading Co Inc underwrote the initial offering.
